net.sf.wubiq.print.services

Class RemotePrintServiceLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.print.PrintServiceLookup
      • net.sf.wubiq.print.services.RemotePrintServiceLookup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RemotePrintServiceLookup
extends javax.print.PrintServiceLookup
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements a RemotePrintServiceLookup aware of the remote print services that are online.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • refreshServices

        public void refreshServices()
        Just to make it compliant (no errors) when pooled from PrintServiceUtils.

      • registerService

        public static boolean registerService(RemotePrintService printService)
        Overrides default behavior and register services in custom form. Should not be called directly instead use RemoteClientManager registration method.
        Parameters:
        printService - Service to be registered.
        Returns:
        Always true.

      • registerRemoteService

        public static boolean registerRemoteService(RemotePrintService printService)
        Overrides default behavior and register services in custom form.
        Parameters:
        printService - Service to be registered.
        Returns:
        Always true.

      • removePrintServices

        public static void removePrintServices(java.lang.String uuid)
        Removes all print services for a given id.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique id of the local print manager.

      • setRemoteDefaultPrintService

        public static void setRemoteDefaultPrintService(RemotePrintService remoteDefaultPrintService)
        Parameters:
        remoteDefaultPrintService - the remoteDefaultPrintService to set

      • isMobile

        public static boolean isMobile(java.lang.String uuid)
        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique uuid.
        Returns:
        True if the pending tasks should be handle as mobile processes.

      • find

        public static RemotePrintService find(java.lang.String uuid,
                                      java.lang.String remotePrintServiceName)
        Finds the print service associated with the remote print service name for the remote computer.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique remote computer identifier.
        remotePrintServiceName - Name of the print service to look for.
        Returns:
        PrintService found or null.
